name: J.F. Aviation, Inc.
about: J.F. Aviation, Inc., located at 4000 West Jefferson Street in Joliet, Illinois, is a comprehensive flight school dedicated to providing top-notch aviation training. Offering a range of programs, including Private Pilot Certificate, Commercial Pilot Certificate, Flight Instructor, Instrument Rating, and Tail Wheel Pilot Training, J.F. Aviation caters to diverse aviation aspirations. The school operates from the Joliet Regional Airport (KJOT) and is staffed by professional flight instructors who tailor training plans to fit individual schedules. Prospective students can start with a $59 introduction flight to experience the school's facilities and instruction. J.F. Aviation is committed to helping students achieve their flying goals in a supportive and structured environment. For more information, contact them at (815) 744-7528 or visit their website at www.jfaviationinc.com. J.F. Aviation is your trusted partner in aviation education.
services:
